ground 50 gr 225 mt green for the leaf 50 gr 240 mt hook n° 2 5 mm us e little pot stuffing abbreviations single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch st stitch or stitches increase 2 single_crochet in a single stitch decrease / decrease decrease by working two single_crochet together 2 note my pattern are for personal use only please don t share reproduce and sell this pattern or creation out from this pattern i m a designer thank you notes the green agave is made in rounds do not join rounds unless told to use a stitch marker to mark the start of round or a small piece of different colored yarn placed under the stitch at the start of the round will do to start a round you can use the magic_ring method or ch2 and work 6 single_crochet into 1st chain large leaf make 6 green color description using green yarn 1 using magic_ring work 6 single_crochet into the ring place a marker to indicate start of round move marker up as each round is completed 6 st 2 *2
